post.title: nvidia 177.66 with video level adjustment
post.content: it looks like a new nvidia driver for all cards is out with video level adjustments in the control panel is available. would anyone care to try it out? direct link: http://www.tcmagazine.com/comments.p...=20802catid=3 thread: http://www.nvnews.net/vbulletin/showthread.php?t=116222
